name: Board Games VR
description: Play board games in virtual reality. backgammon, checkers, etc.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 4590 or similar Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 5820 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 200 MB available space
